section.title: Overview
section.description: The Clear Fields action clears the contents of specified fields on a form or browse.

step.description: Make a selection in the Clear Field(s) in which window? field. This field will be grayed out unless this action is based on a Form or Browse. The choices are:
In the Window Name field select either:
Select the form or browse that you wish to use from the list.
Click Add Object to List to select a field from the Select a Control dialog box to add to the list.
Select an item in the Object Names list and click Remove Object from List to remove to remove it from the list.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
